name: task-list
description: Lists tasks for a specified work order or project. Returns task details including title, status, assignee, and due date.

work_order_id.description: The ID of the work order to list tasks for

project_id.description: The ID of the project to list tasks for

status.description: Filter tasks by status (todo, in-progress, in-review, approved, done, blocked, cancelled)

limit.description: Maximum number of tasks to return (default: 50, max: 100)
